# allowsFullScreen

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the scene can appear full screen.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var allowsFullScreen: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The system only checks the value of this property in Mac Catalyst apps.

## Setting the size restrictions

- **minimumSize**: The minimum width and height supported by your app’s windows.
- **maximumSize**: The maximum width and height supported by your app’s windows.
